title: Putin threatens "retaliatory military-technical" measures as standoff with U.S. and NATO over Ukraine escalates
content:
1. Putin threatens "retaliatory military-technical" measures as standoff with U.S. and NATO over Ukraine escalates  CBS News
  2. Russian Citizens Are Now Being Prepped for Nuclear War  Daily Beast
  3. Putin Makes New Threats As Russia-Ukraine Tensions Grow  NBC News
  4. Putin says Russia has 'nowhere to retreat' over Ukraine  Yahoo News
  5. Putin flunky warns Russia will put 'gun to America's head' as tensions grow  New York Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: プーチン大統領は、ウクライナをめぐる米国およびNATOとの対立が激化する中、「報復的な軍事技術」措置を脅かす。
与美国和北约在乌克兰问题上的对峙升级，普京威胁要采取 "报复性军事技术 "措施
與美國和北約在烏克蘭問題上的對峙升級，普京威脅要採取 "報復性軍事技術 "措施
